content: this legal text summarizes a court case that took place in vicenza on december 22 2022 the court declared a divisional deed from july 17 1973 to be valid and transcribed the property in question located in asiago was divided and assigned to different parties miss ri lo now shares 13 ownership with messrs pi lo lo and al lo messrs do gi st now share a 13 ownership with messrs gi st and br st lastly ms va ms st now owns 12 of the property with ms ca fr the main issue in the case was the authenticity of the subscriptions made in the divisional deed the court found them to be valid even though some parties did not sign the court ordered the necessary registrations and transcriptions to be made and declared that the costs of the proceedings will be offset between the plaintiffs and defendants the defendant who did not appear will bear the costs
